commit.message:
re PR c/69824 (internal compiler error in unshare_body)

	PR c/69824
	* c-decl.c (get_parm_info): Don't queue implicit function declarations
	for later.

	PR c/69824
	* gcc.dg/pr69824.c: New test.

From-SVN: r234000

+	PR c/69824
+	* c-decl.c (get_parm_info): Don't queue implicit function declarations
+	for later.
+
